mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.officename AS "officename", a.code AS "code", a.unitcode AS "unitcode", a.date AS "date", a.unitname AS "unitname", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.mainfile AS "mainfile", a.otherfiles AS "otherfiles", a.examname AS "examname", a.examtext AS "examtext", a.examname2 AS "examname2", a.examtext2 AS "examtext2", a.examname3 AS "examname3", a.examtext3 AS "examtext3", a.isdraft AS "isdraft", a.hostUpperOfficeId AS "hostUpperOfficeId", a.hostUpperOfficeName AS "hostUpperOfficeName"
mapper.select: SELECT a.`ID_` FROM act_re_procdef a WHERE a.key_=#{key} ORDER BY a.`VERSION_` DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_receive_file( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, officename, code, unitcode, date, unitname, title, content, mainfile, otherfiles, examname, examtext, examname2, examtext2, examname3, examtext3, isdraft, hostUpperOfficeId, hostUpperOfficeName ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{officename}, #{code}, #{unitcode}, #{date}, #{unitname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{mainfile}, #{otherfiles}, #{examname}, #{examtext}, #{examname2}, #{examtext2}, #{examname3}, #{examtext3}, #{isdraft}, #{hostUpperOfficeId}, #{hostUpperOfficeName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_receive_file SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, officename = #{officename}, code = #{code}, unitcode = #{unitcode}, date = #{date}, unitname = #{unitname}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, mainfile = #{mainfile}, otherfiles = #{otherfiles}, examname = #{examname}, examtext = #{examtext}, examname2 = #{examname2}, examtext2 = #{examtext2}, examname3 = #{examname3}, examtext3 = #{examtext3}, isdraft = #{isdraft}, hostUpperOfficeId = #{hostUpperOfficeId}, hostUpperOfficeName = #{hostUpperOfficeName} WHERE id = #{id}
